projects.name: DEFTECHLINK
projects.description: DEFTECHLINK is a startup platform connecting defense innovation opportunities with industry, academia, and government partners. I built the entire frontend from scratch, integrating RESTful APIs, implementing authentication flows, setting up Stripe payments for onboarding, and ensuring a responsive, accessible, and polished user interface.
captions: Opportunities page with detailed view modal for quick access to listing information.
Learning hub featuring organized resources and interactive navigation.
Dashboard with free trial banner and key platform metrics at a glance.
Group Opportunities tab showing active collaboration and member engagement.
Events page with filterable listings and intuitive calendar integration.
Rich text editor for article creation with formatting toolbar and live preview.
Landing page hero section designed to make a strong first impression.
Features section highlighting the platform's core capabilities.

projects.name: TIC-TAC-POKÉ
projects.description: Tic-Tac-Poké is a Pokémon-themed twist on classic Tic-Tac-Toe designed as a polished desktop game. It features smooth gameplay, playful visuals, win and draw detection, and an intuitive restart flow for repeat play.

projects.name: SUNNYSIDE WEATHER
projects.description: SunnySide is a desktop weather app that pairs daily forecasts with food-inspired recommendations based on current conditions. It supports saved locations, real-time updates, and a polished light and dark interface.
captions: Daily forecast view in light mode
Daily forecast view in dark mode

projects.name: Sentiment Analyzer
projects.description: A sentiment analysis tool that classifies political social media posts and visualizes sentiment trends through geospatial mapping.

projects.name: EduPortal
projects.description: A secure academic management system supporting role-based access, GPA analysis, enrollment tracking, and institutional data integrity.

projects.name: Purrfect Path
projects.description: A cat-themed class scheduling platform that lets students plan courses, create and compare schedules with friends, and view their schedules and social connections.

projects.name: RUSH: Rapid Unix SHell
projects.description: A Unix shell in C that executes built-in and external commands, supports parallel execution, and features robust output redirection with error handling.

projects.name: RAID-Mapping
projects.description: A C program that maps sectors across RAID levels 0, 1, 01, 10, 4, and 5, identifying their location and corresponding redundancy (copy or parity) on disks.

projects.name: Facial Recognition
projects.description: Implemented LeNet-5 CNN on Olivetti faces and benchmarked against PCA, LDA, and SVM, with performance analysis via CMC curves and confusion matrices.

projects.name: Facial Recognition and Text Classification
projects.description: Built facial recognition and RNN-based text classifier with data augmentation, analyzing performance via training plots and confusion matrices.

projects.name: Matching Game
projects.description: Created a responsive Everglow-themed card matching game with interactive animations, music-synced sound effects, and gameplay tracking.
